answers.text:
We do not have a formal requirement for additional training, but we do provide access to those opportunities.

author: Charlotte Presensky
text: Does your agency require inspection staff in code enforcement and/or building departments to continue to gain additional licensing or certifications as part of their continued emplyment and/or job description?
title: Licensing for Continued Employment
